description: Astilbe 'Sprite' is an amazing variety of astilbe boasting small and abundant white blossoms during late summer. Its delicate foliage appears to cascade and jumble around the flowers, creating a beautiful display. It grows in shade or part sun and is tolerant to various climatic and soil conditions, making it an ideal choice for urban gardening. Its low-maintenance nature makes it perfect for busy gardeners. Astilbe 'Sprite' is often a popular choice for both sunny and shaded landscapes; its multi-seasonal beauty brings interest and colour to any garden all year round.
